Text: Fw Allegheny sample confirmation draft Cc are still working on the execution copies of the confirmations and if the ISDA master is not signed then we should use this format for the heading and conclusion that was previously negotiated You can call Sara Shackelton if you have any questions Original Message From To Sent Friday June AM Subject Re Allegheny sample confirmation draft Forwarded by Becky SpencerHOUECT on AM Sara C To Brent nron T cc Subject Re Allegheny sample confirmation draft AM Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Sara Shackleton To Kimberly NRON cc Subject Re Allegheny sample confirmation draftDocument link Sara PM Shackleton Kim It looks fine and you should use this format until the ISDA is executed We spoke with Allegheny this morning and they promise to execute next week Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Kimberly NRON To Sara CT cc Subject Re Allegheny sample confirmation draftDocument link Sara PM Shackleton Hi Sara Attached are the changes you requested Shall I begin confirming all Allegheny deals on this form until the ISDA is complete See attached file allegheny confirm templatedoc Thanks for your help Kimberly Hundl x From Sara CT on PM To Kimberly NRON cc Subject Re Allegheny sample confirmation draft Document link Kimberly Hundl Kim Attached are my comments See attached file allegheny confirm templateRdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Kimberly NRON To Sara CT AM cc Melissa Ann CT Subject Allegheny sample confirmation draft Hi Sara Ok I think I have properly referenced the side letter in this confirmation Please let me know what changes should be made See attached file allegheny confirm templatedoc PS I am leaving at noon today so if I havent heard from you by then I will give you a call tomorrow morning Thanks Kim x allegheny confirm templatedoc allegheny confirm templateRdoc allegheny confirm templatedoc

XL Trading Cc Adele at Element Re put this agreement together The blackline comments are my additions Does this look sufficient to you My only question is which Enron entity should sign My thought is that ENA should sign since that is the legal entity covered in the GTC but the password application and ETA are in the name of EnronOnline Your thoughts would be appreciated They would like to start trading today if we can get everything ironed out Thanks Brent Becky can you make sure I sent this to the correct Mark Taylor there are now or listings XL Tradingdoc

Side Agreement on GTC Cc my blackline comments to the side agreement you prepared I need to run it by the Enron Online group but do not forsee any objections Let me know if you have any questions or comments Regards Brent Original Message From To Sent Tuesday April AM Subject Re XL Trading Confirmation revised blackline The undersigned parties hereto agree that until a relevant master agreement is executed between XL Trading Partners Ltd Counterparty and Enron North America Corp the terms and conditions set forth in the form of longform confirmation the Deemed ISDA shall be the general terms and conditions governing all weatherderivative transactions on one or more websites or other internetbased electronic trading facilities Website between EnronOnline LLC andor its affiliates Enron and Counterparty and shall replace any General Terms and Conditions established by Enron which are in effect with respect to weatherderivative transactions or are posted on the Website Furthermore any reference to the General Terms and Conditions in the Electronic Trading Agreement or the Password Application between the undersigned shall be deemed a reference to the Deemed ISDA Acknowledged and Agreed to this day of April Element Re Capital Products Inc EnronOnline LLC as Agent of XL Trading Partners Ltd By By Name Lynda Clemmons Name Title President Title Adele M R Raspe General Counsel Derivatives Element Re Capital Products Inc First Stamford Place Suite Stamford CT phone fax BrentHendry enroncom To Sent by cc BeckySpencer Subject Re XL Trading Confirmation revised enroncom blackline AM Adele Regarding the oneliner you needed from Brent he asks that you draft it and then send it to him at home for his review His home email address is Thank you Becky Spencer Assistant to Brent Hendry Office Fax lemen trecom To cc Subject Re XL Trading Confirmation revised blackline PM Return Receipt Your Re XL Trading Confirmation revised blackline document was Adele RaspeElementReXLAmerica received by at PM EDT The information contained in this email message may be privileged and confidential information and is intended only for the use of the individual andor entity identified in the alias address of this message If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or an employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby requested not to distribute or copy this communication If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by telephone or return email and delete the original message from your system XL Tradingdoc
